var accountAddress = "0x0bd615694d433424c292599f080bda45b0c257fc";
personal.unlockAccount(accountAddress, "password");
eth.defaultAccount = eth.coinbase;
var abi = [{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"name":"id","type":"uint256"}],"name":"getEmployee","outputs":[{"name":"","type":"uint256"},{"name":"","type":"string"},{"name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"name":"id","type":"uint256"},{"name":"name","type":"string"}],"name":"addEmployee","outputs":[],"payable":false,"type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"payable":false,"type":"constructor"}];
var bytecode = "";
var multiplierContract = eth.contract(abi);
var instance = multiplierContract.new({
   from:accountAddress,
   data:bytecode,
   gas:3000000}, function(err, contractInstance){
    if(!err) {
       if(!contractInstance.address) {
           console.log("Tx Hash: " + contractInstance.transactionHash) // The hash of the transaction, which deploys the contract
       } else {
           console.log("Address: " + contractInstance.address) // the contract address
       }
    }
	else {
		console.log(err);
	}
});

miner.start(4);
 
instance.multiply(40);
